#BlackMagicCraft #Episode124 #underdark

In this episode I demonstrate how you can make a full set of modular underdark terrain for Dungeons & Dragons using only $6 in material and a couple very basic household crafting tools. 

A huge thank you to The Dragon Trapper's Lodge for sponsoring this episode!

Check out The DRAGON TRAPPER'S LODGE
http://bit.ly/dragon-trappers-patreon

They also have previous models available for individual purchase at: 
http://bit.ly/Dragon-trappers-store

title: How to Make an UNDERDARK Terrain Set for $6 - BEGINNER FRIENDLY
